analysis.summary: The test results indicate that the application's login functionality is not fully stable, with a pass rate of 80%. The failed test case for 'Login with valid credentials' suggests a critical issue in the application's core functionality.
coverageGaps: Lack of test coverage for edge cases or error handling in the login process
trends: Consistent passing of login tests with invalid credentials, indicating potential issues in the validation logic
recommendations: Investigate and address the root cause of the failure in the 'Login with valid credentials' test case
Expand test coverage to include more edge cases and error handling scenarios in the login process
Implement a more comprehensive regression testing suite to ensure the stability of the login functionality
criticalIssues: Failure in the 'Login with valid credentials' test case, which is a critical functionality

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page
Enter valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
steps.error: Expected to be redirected to overview page

steps.step: Verify that the welcome message is displayed with the customer name (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify that the account overview section is displayed (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify that the available accounts are listed with account numbers and balances (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify that the right side navigation menu with banking options is displayed (EXPECT: SUCCESS)

errors: Step 5: Expected to be redirected to overview page; Step 6: Expected "Welcome" message not found

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page
Enter invalid username 'invaliduser'
Enter valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is not redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating invalid login credentials (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Navigate to the ParaBank login page
Enter valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter invalid password 'invalidpass'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is not redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating invalid login credentials (EXPECT: SUCCESS)

results.testName: Login with empty username or password

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page
Leave the username field empty
Enter valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is not redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating that both username and password are required (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Clear the username field
Enter valid username 'ficusroot'
Leave the password field empty
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is not redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating that both username and password are required (EXPECT: SUCCESS)

results.testName: Access account overview page without logging in

steps.step: Navigate to the account overview page URL directly (https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/overview.htm)
Verify that the user is not redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Verify that the user is redirected to the login page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
